data.title: Renault 1898-1966 by Yves Richard [The Renault Corporation was Founded in 1899 as Société Renault Frères by Louis Renault (12 February 1877 - 24 October 1944) and His Brothers Marcel Renault (14 May 1
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - Published by Éditions Pierre Tisné, France First Edition . 1966. - 1966 - Dust Jacket Included - First edition hard back binding in publisher's original light brown canvas effect cloth covers, dark brown title lettering to the spine and to the front cover along with archive photograph, engineer's drawings to the end papers. Landscape 9'' x 12¼''. Contains 176 printed pages of English text with monochrome illustrations and photographs throughout, beautifully produced single-sided full-page colour plates throughout. Very Good condition book in original glassine dust wrapper which has one small piece missing to the bottom front cover, and one small tear to the top front corner. Member of the P.B.F.A. MOTORING, SPORTS CARS - Renault 1898-1966
data.text:
About this Item

First edition hard back binding in publisher's original light brown canvas effect cloth covers, dark brown title lettering to the spine and to the front cover along with archive photograph, engineer's drawings to the end papers. Landscape 9'' x 12¼''. Contains 176 printed pages of English text with monochrome illustrations and photographs throughout, beautifully produced single-sided full-page colour plates throughout. Very Good condition book in original glassine dust wrapper which has one small piece missing to the bottom front cover, and one small tear to the top front corner. Member of the P.B.F.A. MOTORING, SPORTS CARS. Seller Inventory # 96691
